Model Creation¶

create_model.create_model()[source]¶

Generate Antimony and SBML models based on given data

Parameters:

  • antimony_model_name ([str]) – name for the generated Antimony model

  • sbml_model_name ([str]) – name for the generated SBML model

  • f_comp ([str]) – compartments & volumes file

  • f_stoi ([str]) – stoichiometric matric file

  • f_outp ([str]) – output parameters file

  • f_rate – ratelaws file

  • f_rate – [str]

  • f_spec ([str]) – species file

  • verbose – verbose

  • verbose – [bool]

Returns:

Nothing

Return type:

[void]

Antimony¶

write_model.antimony_write_model()[source]¶

Generate an Antimony file based on given data

Parameters:

  • antimony_model_name ([str]) – name for the generated antimony model

  • f_compartments ([str]) – compartments & volumes file

  • f_stoichmat ([str]) – stoichiometric matrix file

  • f_output_params ([str]) – output parameters file

  • f_ratelaws ([str]) – ratelaws file

  • f_species ([str]) – species file

Returns:

The file name of the generated Antimony model

Return type:

[str]
